questions.question: What are the types of de-icing/anti-icing fluid in common use for turbojet aircraft?
options: Type I,II,III
Type II, III, IV
Type I, III, IV
Type I,II,IV

questions.question: What can affect holdover time?
options: Type of fluid, OAT, precipitant, wind
Skin temperature, OAT, precipitant, location of de-ice pan
OAT, wind, type of fluid, whether engines are running or not
Wind, MTOM, whether it is daytime or night-time, airfield altitude
questions.solution: Type of fluid, OAT, precipitant, wind

questions.question: How can icing conditions affect performance?
options: Increase lift by 30%, decrease drag by 40%
Increase lift by 40% decrease drag by 30%
Decrease lift by 40% increase drag by 30%
Decrease lift by 30% increase drag by 40%
questions.solution: Decrease lift by 30% increase drag by 40%

questions.question: Which of the following is formally listed as incompatible land use around airports?
options: Zoo
Landfill
School
Coal mine

questions.question: What is the minimum height for a power reduction on a Noise Abatement Departure Procedure?
options: 500 ft
600 ft
700 ft
800 ft

questions.question: Which of the following statements would not be acceptable in aerodrome procedures?
options: Use of reverse thrust should be avoided between the hours of 2200-0600
Use of reverse thrust is to be minimized between the hours of 2200-0600
Use of reverse thrust is prohibited between the hours of 2200-0600
Use of reverse thrust should be minimized at all times
questions.solution: Use of reverse thrust is prohibited between the hours of 2200-0600
